name: Terry the Pterodactyl
description:
This is a project created for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) game jam as a way to teach my child how to game code while also learning appropriate art development with photoshop. The only contribution I had other than teaching command prompts and photoshop techniques was a quick playthrough to help edit grammar and spelling mistakes. The rest was done on her own and I am proud to see what can be created with just a bit of time and imagination in front of  a computer.

The game's description from the creator herself:

This game is about a journey through a cave that has twists and turns everywhere. They make friends and also lose some too.
